author: jeffrey.downard
title: DIDs for Health Records
description: How to promote widespread adoption of Atala Prism for health records?
solution: Start with owners of pets for vet records. Then, transition from pet health records to human health records.
experience: Business law, non-profit law, tax law, teaching law, developer, business systems consultant, Full Stack Dev, Plutus and Atala-Prism pilot.
